title: Mid-Grade T206s Now for SALE - Prices Reduced - ONLY 3 LEFT

posts.post_title: Mid-Grade T206s Now for SALE - Prices Reduced - ONLY 3 LEFT
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Matt
Update (1/8): Prices reduced on remaining cards.
Update (12/30): Cards are now for sale.  Price includes confirmed shipping in a bubble mailer.  

I have the following Cleveland T206s for trade for any T-sized card of the players on the bottom list - I'll even accept T202 end-panels. All I care about is the front appearance, if the back is completely torn off, that's perfect. I will also add cash if need be.

T206s for sale/trade (scans below):

Clarke SC150 VG (rough cut, but no creases) $20
Hinchman SC150 VG $22
Perring P350 VG $22

Rhoades (hands at chest) P350 VG $22 sold
Rhoades (throwing) SC350 VG-EX $32 sold
Liebhardt SC150 F649 G $16 sold
Birmingham SC150 VG $25 sold
Bradley (portrait) SC150 VG $25 sold
Bradley (with bat) P350 VG-EX $35 sold
Flick SC150 F $50 sold
Goode P150 VG $25 sold


Wants (T205, T206, T207, M116, T202 ends, etc.):

Baker 
Birmingham (vertical card)
Butcher
Blanding
Chase got one, thanks
E Collins 
Crawford
Falkenberg
Ford
Gregg
Kaler  got one, thanks
